Hello Folks,

I am working on a WordPress Portfolio Plugin and has few features into it which is not quite enough i feel now banking upon on your vital suggestions which can make my plugin out of the box. Feel free to post suggestions.

Here are the list of existing features

Social Share, Post Type Format ( Standard / Video ) , Layout ( Full Width / Boxed ), List ( Grid / Masonry ), Awesome Hovers and PopUp Effects ( Almost 20 ), Typography Option.

Now i want to add some more or unique and spicy features. So please give us your valuable suggestion.

Feel free to post suggestions.

Waiting for your words.
